model

Class Fox

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Animal
      • model.Fox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Fox
extends Animal
    A simple model of a fox. Foxes age, move, eat rabbits, and die.
    Version:
    2012.02.07
    Author:
    David J. Barnes and Michael Kolling, Marco, Malcolm, Harold

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fox

        public Fox(boolean randomAge,
   Field field,
   Location location,
   Simulator brain)
        Create a fox. A fox can be created as a new born (age zero and not hungry) or with a random age and food level.
        Parameters:
        randomAge - If true, the fox will have random age and hunger level.
        field - The field currently occupied.
        location - The location within the field.

      • Fox

        public Fox(boolean randomAge,
   Field field,
   Location location,
   int foodLevel,
   Simulator brain)
        Constructor for a fox
        Parameters:
        randomAge - If true, the fox wil have random age and hunger level.
        fiel - The field currently occupied
        location - The location within the field.
        foodLevel - The starting foodLevel of a fox.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(java.util.List<Actor> newFoxes)
        This is what the fox does most of the time: it hunts for rabbits. In the process, it might breed, die of hunger, or die of old age.
        Specified by:
        act in interface Actor
        Specified by:
        act in class Animal
        Parameters:
        field - The field currently occupied.
        newFoxes - A list to add newly born foxes to.

        int Max age of the fox

      • incrementHunger

        public void incrementHunger()
        Make this fox more hungry. This could result in the fox's death.

      • findFood

        public Location findFood(Location location)
        Tell the fox to look for rabbits adjacent to its current location. Only the first live rabbit is eaten.
        Parameters:
        location - Where in the field it is located.
        Returns:
        Where food was found, or null if it wasn't.

        Get amount of food a fox has

        foodlevel The amount of food
